heading: Evade Spiritborn Build Nerf Incoming
content: Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred are here and the released our massive Season 6 Compendium a few days go. After monitoring the release and patching the expansion with 4 hotfixes since the Vessel of Hatred expansion launch, Adam Fletcher just posted a tweet announcing the Spiritborn's animation breaking is going to be nerfed. We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes while following vrious Vessel of Hatred hotfixes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
